name: BroadcastChannel.postMessage
description: The BroadcastChannel.postMessage() sends a message, which can be of any kind of Object, to each listener in any browsing context with the same origin. The message is transmitted as a message event targeted at each BroadcastChannel bound to the channel.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'BroadcastChannel.postmessage()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
